title: 112_hr2553
content: The "Airport and Airway Extension Act of 2011, Part IV" extends fuel and ticket taxes funding the Airport and Airway Trust Fund until September 16, 2011. The amendments made by this Act will take effect on July 23, 2011. The Authority section of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended to change dates related to the Airport and Airway Extension Act of 2011. The Airport Improvement Program's authorization of appropriations is extended until September 16, 2011. The Airport Improvement Program's authorization of appropriations is extended until September 16, 2011, with various sections of the title 49, United States Code, being amended to reflect the new dates. The authorization of appropriations for the Airport Improvement Program is extended until September 16, 2011, with amendments made to various sections of title 49, United States Code, to reflect the new dates. SEC. 6. ESSENTIAL AIR SERVICE REFORM. Section 41731(a)(1) of title 49, United States Code, is amended to redesignate clauses and subparagraphs, with changes to wording and insertion of new provisions. The amendments made by this section shall take effect on September 17, 2011. Section 41731 of title 49, United States Code is amended to include exceptions for locations in Alaska, removing the requirement for locations in Alaska to meet certain criteria for eligibility under the Essential Air Service program. The Secretary may waive certain criteria for locations in Alaska under the Essential Air Service program if undue difficulty in accessing airports is determined.
